mail.payment.success.subject: You paid for an issue on Gitpay
mail.payment.success.content.main: You paid ${{value}} for the issue {{title}} on Gitpay.
mail.payment.assigned.subject: There is a new payment for an issue that you were assigned to
mail.payment.assigned.content.main: Hello, a payment of ${{value}} was added to the issue {{title}}
mail.payment.assigned.content.secondary: You are now assigned to this issue. Once finished, a bounty will be sent to your account
mail.payment.subject.error: We couldn't process this payment on Gitpay.
mail.payment.content.error: Hello, we had an issue with your payment of ${{value}} for the issue {{title}}
mail.payment.subject.cancel: Your request to cancel an authorized payment from Gitpay was confirmed
mail.payment.content.cancel: Hello, we canceled a payment authorization of ${{value}} for the issue {{title}}
mail.payment.subject.refund: Your order for an issue you paid for on Gitpay has been refunded.
mail.payment.content.refund: Hello, a refund of ${{value}} was made for the payment of the issue {{title}}
mail.payment.oldBountyRefunded.subject: Your PayPal payment was refunded for an old open bounty on Gitpay
mail.payment.oldBountyRefunded.subjectPa: Your PayPal payment was refunded for an old open bounty on Gitpay
mail.payment.oldBountyRefunded.content:
A PayPal payment you made {{age}} ago for the issue {{title}} was automatically refunded. This happens when a bounty stays open for more than {{threshold}} with no merged pull request and long inactivity.

No action is required on your side. If development resumes, you can fund the bounty again from the issue page.
mail.payment.oldBountyRefunded.payoutNot: Because the PayPal refund time limit was exceeded, we returned the funds via a PayPal payout.
mail.payment.oldBountyRefunded.footer: If you believe this is a mistake, reply to this email or contact us at contact@gitpay.me.
mail.assign.owner.subject: Someone is interested in solving an issue you imported to Gitpay.
mail.assign.owner.main: {{name}} is interested in working on the issue {{title}}.
mail.assign.owner.sec: You can accept or reject this proposal.
mail.messageInterested.subject: You received a message about an issue you're interested in on Gitpay
mail.messageInterested.intro: {{name}} wrote about the issue {{title}} you're interested in on Gitpay:
mail.messageAuthor.subject: You received a message about an issue you imported to Gitpay
mail.messageAuthor.intro: {{name}} wrote about the issue {{title}} that you imported to Gitpay:
mail.assign.owner.assigned.subject: You have assigned {{assignedName}} to work on an issue
mail.assign.owner.assigned.main: You assigned {{assignedName}} to work on the issue {{title}} on Gitpay
mail.assign.owner.assigned.contact:
Here is the email: {{assignedEmail}}.
You may contact them to provide any extra instructions.
mail.assign.owner.assigned.deadline.date: You set the deadline for this issue at: {{date}}
mail.assign.owner.assigned.deadline.days: The suggested finish date is {{days}} days from now
mail.assign.owner.assigned.instructions: You can follow the progress of the issue and review it when the assigned user submits the PR
mail.interested.user.assigned.main:
The user {{username}} was assigned to {{title}}, an issue you were interested in.

Don't worry, you can look for other issues available.
mail.interested.user.assigned.subject: User assigned to an issue you are interested in
mail.interested.owner.subject: You're interested in this issue
mail.interested.main: You're interested in working on the issue {{title}} on Gitpay
mail.interested.owner.sec: The owner will be notified about your interest, and you will receive a confirmation if they accept your request.
mail.assigned.subject: You were assigned to work on an issue from Gitpay
mail.assigned.main: You were assigned to start working on this issue on Gitpay: {{title}}
mail.assigned.message:
The project owner will contact you to provide more details about the kickstart.

The deadline for this issue is: {{deadline}}.

This means that you have to send a solution by {{deadlineFromNow}}.

You can add the deadline to your Google Calendar

To start, follow these steps:

  • Fork this project
  • Follow the instructions to run locally
  • Develop a solution and stay in sync with the maintainer
  • Always stay up to date with the main repository
  • Send a Pull Request
  • They will make a code review

Once your Pull Request is approved, you will receive a bounty in your account.
mail.assigned.error: We had an issue with some notifications about interested users for an issue on Gitpay.
mail.assigned.nodate: No deadline was set for this issue
mail.deadline.update.subject: The deadline for this issue was updated
mail.assigned.update.intro: We updated the deadline for this issue {{title}} you're working on: {{title}}
mail.assigned.update.message:
The deadline is: {{deadline}}

This means that you have to send a solution by {{deadlineFromNow}}.

Please let us know if this is not enough so that we can review it.
mail.deadline.daysLeft.subject: Hello {{name}},
mail.deadline.remember.subject: There's a deadline coming for an issue you were assigned on Gitpay
mail.deadline.remember.intro: The issue you are working on {{title}} is about to reach its deadline, and we would like to check if everything is going well with the progress of the issue.
mail.deadline.remember.message: The deadline is {{deadline}}. You have {{deadlineFromNow}} days from now. If you need more time, that is no problem; we will let the author know, and you can renegotiate to deliver on time. If you gave up for some reason, please let the author know as soon as possible so other users can be assigned
mail.deadline.update.error: We had an issue with some notifications about interested users for an issue on Gitpay.
mail.deadline.end.subject: The deadline for the issue you were assigned ended.
mail.deadline.end.intro:
The issue ({{title}}

) that you were assigned on Gitpay reached the deadline date, and maybe you will need to review your assignment.
mail.deadline.end.owner.subject: The deadline for the issue that you created on Gitpay ended
mail.deadline.end.owner.intro:
The issue ({{title}}

) that you created on Gitpay reached the deadline date, and you can unassign or extend the deadline.
mail.assigned.request.subject: You were accepted to work on an issue on Gitpay
mail.assigned.request.deny.subject: The user interested in working on an issue on Gitpay rejected the assignment
mail.assigned.request.deny.body:
Hello {{name}}

The assignment of the issue {{title}} {{title}} - {{url}} was rejected by the user {{user}}.

The reason was: {{message}}
mail.assigned.request.body:
Hello {{name}}

You're interested in working on the issue {{title}} - {{url}} on Gitpay.

To start your work, please accept or reject this proposal.
mail.status.subject: We updated the status of an issue you were interested in on Gitpay.
mail.status.message.first: We updated the deadline for this issue you're working on: {{title}}
mail.status.when.closed:
The issue {{title}} was closed on Github, so we closed it on Gitpay.

You can change the issue status if you want.
mail.status.error: We had an issue with some notifications about interested users for an issue on Gitpay
mail.transfer.new.subject.success: A new transfer was made for an issue on Gitpay
mail.transfer.new.message.success: A transfer of ${{value}} will be sent to you for the issue {{title}}
mail.transfer.notify.subject.success: A transfer was confirmed for an issue on Gitpay
mail.transfer.notify.message.success: You confirmed a transfer of ${{value}} for {{title}}
mail.transfer.error.subject: We had an issue sending a transfer for an issue on Gitpay
mail.transfer.error.message: We had an issue with a transfer of ${{value}} for this issue: {{title}}
mail.transfer.missing.subject: Activate your account to receive transfers for your concluded issues.
mail.transfer.missing.message: You received a transfer from Gitpay but haven't activated your account yet. Please activate your account at https://gitpay.me/#/profile/user-account/bank to receive your bounties
mail.transfer.bounty.subject: You transferred a bounty to another issue on Gitpay
mail.transfer.invalid.message: To receive a payment for your issue, you need to complete your account details and bank account in Account details
mail.transfer.bounty.message: You transferred a bounty of ${{amount}} from {{taskFromTitle}} to {{taskToTitle}}
mail.assign.remove.subject: You were unassigned from an issue
mail.assign.remove.message:
You were unassigned from the issue {{title}} on Gitpay

The issue owner sent the reason:

{{message}}
mail.assign.remove.owner.subject: The user was unassigned from an issue you created on Gitpay
mail.assign.remove.owner.message:
The user {{user}} ({{email}}) was unassigned from the issue {{title}} on Gitpay

The reason was:

{{message}}
mail.invite.send.action: You were invited by {{name}} to work on an issue on Gitpay :-)
mail.funding.send.action: You were invited by {{username}} to fund an issue on Gitpay
mail.invite.send.message:
You were invited by {{name}} to work on this issue {{title}} on Gitpay.

Title: {{title}}

Price: ${{value}}

Discover more and apply to work on it!, just click on the interested button. You will be assigned by the owner

Message:

{{message}}

Why you received this e-mail?

Maybe you were invited because you already work on this project and are preferred by the maintainer to solve this issue.
mail.funding.send.message:
Hello,
{{username}} invites you to contribute with ${{suggestedValue}} for the issue {{title}}.

They suggested the deadline for {{suggestedDate}}

{{message}}

You can add a bounty at {{url}}
mail.assign.register.error: Someone is interested in an issue but couldn't receive the email
mail.webhook.payment.success.subject: You made a new purchase on your card from Gitpay
mail.webhook.payment.success.message:
A payment was made on your credit card for an issue on Gitpay. When the issue is concluded, the payment will be sent to the person you assigned.

Name on credit card: {{name}}

Last 4 digits: {{number}}
mail.webhook.payment.update.subject: The payment for this issue was updated!
mail.webhook.payment.update.message: The payment of ${{amount}} for an issue on Gitpay was approved
mail.webhook.invoice.update.subject: The payment for an issue you are working on Gitpay has been updated
mail.webhook.invoice.update.message: The payment of ${{amount}} for an issue you were assigned on Gitpay was processed
mail.webhook.invoice.create.subject: There's a new invoice for the issue you're working on Gitpay
mail.webhook.invoice.create.message: An invoice of ${{amount}} for an issue you were assigned on Gitpay was generated, and we will let you know when the payment has been processed
mail.webhook.payment.refund.subject: You received a refund for an issue you paid for on Gitpay
mail.webhook.payment.refund.message: The refund of ${{amount}} for an issue on Gitpay is concluded, and you should receive the amount on your credit card.
mail.webhook.payment.approved.subject: The payment for your issue was approved on Gitpay!
mail.webhook.payment.approved.message: The payment of ${{amount}} for an issue was approved.
mail.webhook.payment.unapproved.subject: The payment for an issue you made on Gitpay wasn't approved
mail.webhook.payment.unapproved.message:
The payment of ${{amount}} for an issue on Gitpay wasn't approved

Reason: {{reason}}

.
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.subject: There's a transfer from a claim initiated on Gitpay
mail.webhook.payment.transfer.message: A transfer of ${{amount}} claimed on Gitpay was initiated for the issue {{url}}. You should now see a payout in transit to your account.
mail.webhook.payout.subject: There's a Gitpay payout on the way!
mail.webhook.payout.message: A new payout will be soon in your account, and we will let you know when it's concluded.
mail.webhook.payout.intransit.subject: There's a Gitpay payout in transit to your bank account!
mail.webhook.payout.intransit.message: A payout is in transit to your account, and we will let you know when it's concluded.
mail.webhook.payout.intransit.details: The estimated date to be paid is {{date}}.
mail.webhook.payout.fail.subject: We had an issue with your payout on Gitpay
mail.webhook.payout.fail.message: There was an error processing the payout on Gitpay, and we will try again in a few days.
mail.webhook.payout.fail.details: Please check your bank account details on Gitpay to avoid further issues.
mail.webhook.payout.updated.subject: Your Gitpay payout was updated!
mail.webhook.payout.updated.message: Your payout from a payment on Gitpay was updated
mail.webhook.payout.updated.details.trac:
We have a trace ID (reference number) available: {{traceId}}

With the trace ID, you can check with your bank if you can't see the payout in your account in 5 business days.
mail.webhook.payout.updated.details.no_t:
No trace ID was provided for this payout.

If you can't see the payout in your account in 5 business days, please get in touch with our support at contact@gitpay.me.
mail.webhook.payout.finished.subject: A transfer from Gitpay was successfully deposited in your account!
mail.webhook.payout.finished.message: We made a payout to your bank account, and you will see it in your transactions as a payment from Gitpay.
mail.webhook.payout.finished.details: Be aware that your payout can take 5 business days to appear in your account.
mail.webhook.github.issue.new.subject: A new issue from your repository was added on Gitpay: {{title}}
mail.webhook.github.issue.new.message:
Your issue {{issue}} from your repo {{repo}} was added on Gitpay, and now you can add a bounty and assign developers interested in solving your issues.

Here is the URL: {{task}}
mail.issue.me.subject: You imported a new issue to Gitpay
mail.issue.new.subtitle1:
You imported a new issue from {{provider}} on Gitpay:
{{title}}

Now you can add a bounty or invite sponsors to fund your issue. You can invite collaborators to solve your issue, too. The user who solves the issue and merges the PR will receive the bounties added to this issue.
mail.issue.new.footerMessage: You received this message because you imported your issue to Gitpay
mail.issue.payment.subject: A bounty of ${{value}} for the issue: {{title}} was added on Gitpay
mail.issue.payment.title: A payment of ${{value}} with a credit card was added to the issue
mail.issue.bounties.subject: We have issues with bounties on Gitpay
mail.issue.bounties.title: There are still open issues with bounties on Gitpay for you to solve
mail.issue.bounties.action: If you want to contribute to open source, check our issues on Gitpay
mail.issue.bounties.calltoaction: See the issue on Gitpay and apply to solve it
mail.issue.latest.subject: We have open issues for you on Gitpay
mail.issue.latest.title: There are open issues that need to be solved on Gitpay. You can show your interest, make an offer, or contribute to improve your experience and try new challenges
mail.issue.latest.action: If you want to contribute to open source, check our issues on Gitpay
mail.issue.latest.calltoaction: See the issue on Gitpay and apply to solve it
mail.issue.payment.instructions:
What you need to do now?

  • You can apply to solve the issue and let us know your interest
  • You will be assigned
  • Send a Pull Request with the solution
  • We will review
  • Your changes are approved and go live, and you receive a bounty
mail.issue.subject: We have a new issue for you on Gitpay
mail.issue.me.title: You just created a new issue on Gitpay
mail.issue.title: We have a new issue for you on Gitpay
mail.issue.me.instructions:
What you need to do now?

  • Add a bounty and set the deadline if you want
  • You will receive offers from our contributors
  • Click "Choose" on the Interested section
  • Send the necessary details to the assigned user
  • They will send a Pull Request for you
  • Approve and send bounty
  • The contributor will receive your bounty
mail.issue.calltoaction: Check out the issue on Gitpay
mail.issue.instructions:
How to start working on this project?

  • Access the issue on Gitpay
  • Click "I'm interested"
  • Access the project repo and create a fork
  • Send a Pull Request
  • The maintainers will review, then you will receive proper feedback and make the necessary adjustments to fit with the project guidelines
  • Then you will be rewarded
mail.issue.docs.title: We have this documentation to help you (in Portuguese for now)
mail.issue.reason: You received this message because you subscribed to Gitpay
mail.report.send.action: We received a new report from an issue imported to Gitpay
mail.report.send.message:
We received a new report from the issue {{title}}:

Reason: {{selectedReason}}

Approve
mail.report.delete.send.action: Your issue created on Gitpay was deleted by our team
mail.report.delete.send.message:
The issue you created on Gitpay: {{title}}

It was deleted by our team because it violates our guidelines.

Reason: {{selectedReason}}
mail.issue.claim.request.subject: You claimed an issue on Gitpay
mail.issue.claim.request.body:
You claimed the issue {{title}} on Gitpay.

You need to be registered on Gitpay with the same Github login from the source repository.

Claim
mail.issue.claim.confirmation.subject: Your issue was claimed on Gitpay
mail.issue.claim.confirmation.body:
The issue {{title}} you imported on Gitpay was claimed by the author.

So now you don't have admin access to this issue anymore.

Comments: {{comments}}
issue.invalid.script.subject: The issue you created on Gitpay was deleted
issue.invalid.script.message: The issue you imported with the {{url}} to Gitpay was deleted from our list on Gitpay because it is an invalid issue URL.
mail.order.expiredOrders.subject: The pre-authorized payment for an issue on Gitpay expired
mail.order.expiredOrders.content.main: The pre-authorized payment of ${{value}} for the issue {{title}} made using Paypal expired, and you need to make a new payment to keep the bounty available. Checkout your payments on https://gitpay.me/#/profile/payments to see your payments.
mail.webhook.wallet.invoice.subject: New Invoice for Adding Funds to Your Gitpay Wallet
mail.webhook.wallet.invoice.message: We generated a new invoice of ${{amount}} to add funds to your {{walletName}} wallet on Gitpay.
mail.webhook.wallet.invoice.footer: Youâ€™re receiving this message because you recently requested to add funds to your Gitpay wallet.
mail.paymentRequest.created.subject: A payment request was created on Gitpay
mail.paymentRequest.created.message:
A payment request was created on Gitpay and it's available for payment.

Title: {{title}}
Description: {{description}}
Requested Amount: {{amount}} USD
Payment Link: Pay here

You can check the payment request details on Gitpay.
mail.paymentRequest.transferInitiated.su: A claim for a payment request was initiated on Gitpay
mail.paymentRequest.transferInitiated.me: The claim for your Gitpay payment request was automatically initiated after the successful payment. Here are the details of your payment request:
mail.paymentRequest.transferInitiated.bo: You can check the claim details on Gitpay
mail.paymentRequest.paymentMadeForPaymen: A payment was made for your payment request on Gitpay
A payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} was made for your Gitpay payment request.

The claim for this payment will be initiated automatically to your registered bank account.

You can check the payment request details on Gitpay.
mail.paymentRequest.newBalanceTransactio: We have a new adjustment in your Payment Request on Gitpay

There's a new transaction caused by a payment request due to dispute, refund, or adjustment in your account balance. This amount will be deducted in your next claims.

Here are the details of the transaction:
You can check the transaction details on Gitpay.
Payment request payment credit applied to balance
Refund payment request made by the customer
mail.paymentRequest.newDisputeCreatedFor: A new dispute has been opened for your payment request on Gitpay

A new dispute has been created for a recent payment related to your payment request.

Current status: {{status}}

To submit evidence, please contact contact@gitpay.me. You can contact your customer as soon as possible to cancel the dispute with the bank. If there is no response, the dispute fee will be deducted from your balance in your next claims. You can review the dispute details on Gitpay.
mail.paymentRequest.disputeClosedForPaym: A dispute for your payment request was closed on Gitpay

The dispute regarding a recent payment related to your payment request has been closed.

Final status: {{status}}
You can review the dispute details on Gitpay.
mail.paymentRequest.newDisputeClosedForP: When you win a dispute, the disputed amount is returned to your balance.
When you lose a dispute, the disputed amount deducted from your balance is lost.
mail.user.activation.subject: Activate your Gitpay account
mail.user.activation.message.subtitle: We need to confirm your e-mail to activate your account.
mail.user.changeEmailNotification.subjec: You requested to change your email on Gitpay
mail.user.changeEmailNotification.messag:
Hi {{name}}

You requested to change your email on Gitpay

To confirm, please see below:
mail.user.changeEmailNotification.footer: If you didn't make this request, please ignore this email.
mail.user.alertOldEmailAboutChange.subje: Your email was changed on Gitpay
mail.user.alertOldEmailAboutChange.messa:
Hi {{name}}

Your email on Gitpay was changed to {{newEmail}}

If you didn't make this change, please contact us immediately at contact@gitpay.me.
mail.user.alertOldEmailAboutChange.butto: Contact us immediately if you didn't make this change
mail.user.alertOldEmailAboutChange.foote: You received this message because you have an account on Gitpay and a request to change the email was made on the platform.
mail.user.confirmedChangeUserEmail.subje: You successfully changed your email on Gitpay
mail.user.confirmedChangeUserEmail.messa:
Hi {{name}}

Your email on Gitpay was successfully changed to {{newEmail}}

If you didn't make this change, please contact us immediately at contact@gitpay.me.
mail.user.confirmedChangeUserEmailOldEma: You successfully changed your email on Gitpay

Hi {{name}}

Your email on Gitpay was successfully changed from this email to {{newEmail}}

If you didn't make this change, please contact us immediately at contact@gitpay.me.
mail.issue.claim.subject: You have an unclaimed bounty on Gitpay
mail.issue.claim.message:
We have good news!

You solved an issue on Gitpay: {{title}} (see on Github)

The related Pull Request was merged on Github, and there's a bounty waiting for you to claim.
mail.issue.claim.details:
You are one step away from claiming your bounty.

Here are the steps you need to complete:

1. Log in to your Gitpay account.

2. Activate your bank account in Payout Settings.

3. Go to the issue page on Gitpay: {{title}}.

4. Click on Send Solution.

5. Send your PR which solve the issue: {{prURL}}
mail.issue.claim.footer: If you have any questions or issues with your payout, please get in touch with us at contact@gitpay.me.
